argument.description: Optional. The number of digits to round the fractional seconds to.

description: The PostgreSQL current_timestamp function returns the current date and time with the time zone.
sample:
postgres=# SELECT current_timestamp;
              now
-------------------------------
 2014-04-24 20:55:09.808294+00
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT current_timestamp(1);
       timestamptz
--------------------------
 2014-04-24 20:55:09.8+00
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT current_timestamp(2);
        timestamptz
---------------------------
 2014-04-24 20:55:09.81+00
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT current_timestamp(3);
        timestamptz
----------------------------
 2014-04-24 20:55:09.808+00
(1 row)
